scripts.heroku-postbuild: if [ "$APP_TYPE" = "api" ]; then cd packages/shared && npm install --include=dev && npm run build && cd ../../apps/api && npm install && npm run build; elif [ "$APP_TYPE" = "web" ]; then cd packages/shared && npm install --include=dev && npm run build && cd ../../apps/web && npm ci --legacy-peer-deps --include=dev && npm run build; else echo 'APP_TYPE not set'; fi
